title: VITgram
body1sub: This is a project made during my final year, took around 3 months to complete
body2: Created for the ViTians Clubs and Chapters
body2sub: for the Vitians, by a Vitian
subtitle: A Social Media WebApp for VIT Students
para: The web-based social network (VITgram) is a dynamic platform designed to connect individuals based on shared interests, fostering meaningful interactions and community engagement like clubs and chapters posting and idea sharing between peers to peers.

title: SumIT
body1: Integrated Optical Character recognition with Tesseract.js
body1sub: OCR enable to convert the image to Text and we further filter it till number
body2: Possibility of helping many Winter Business Vendors
body2sub: Save Time and need the minimum effort to understand
subtitle: An OCR based tool for Tibetan Winter Business Sellers
para: This tool is designed specifically forTibetanWinter Business Sellers, aiming to alleviate the cumbersome process of manual calculations from their books.

title: FindMyPrompt
body1sub: The backend storage for this project was covered by the MongoDB.
body2: Searchable Prompt with the CRUD functionalities
body2sub: prompts are created by the users
subtitle: A Crud based Fullstack Project
para: FINDMYPROMPT addresses the inherent issue of generating insightful queries by providing users with a curated selection of related prompts.

title: DearDiary
body1: A personal Space in this Busy world
body1sub: a note based webapp enabling to share what on your mind
body2sub: Only authorize person can view the diary
subtitle: A Digital Note to your younger self
para: Introducing DearDiary, your personal sanctuary in the digital realm. Within its virtual pages, you're invited to pour out your thoughts, dreams, and reflections without inhibition

title: Vtop Clone
body1: A Clone project for my College
body1sub: This is a project made during my second year, took around 3 months to complete
body2: Created with plain HTML and CSS
body2sub: for the Vitians, by a Vitian
subtitle: A Clone of VTOP website
para: In a daily basis, every VIT student visits VIT website(vtop) at least twice a day. Whether it is for checking attendance or to upload their digital assessment. Vtop has become a lifestyle in one student life in VIT.

title: Anime Web Portal
body1sub: Made this project to understand the working of API
body2sub: Description of many anime that are coming from api
subtitle: An Anime SearchBOOK
para: Introducing AnimePortal, your one-stop destination for all things anime. With AnimePortal, immerse yourself in the thrilling world of Japanese animation as you explore the latest airing anime and their captivating descriptions
